message:
I pray for a day 
 When there'll be 
 Justice and unity

Where we put aside our differences
 Fighting makes no sense
 Just a little faith
 To make it a better place

I dream for a day
 When there'll be 
 No more misery

When there's no more hunger
 No need for shelter
 Isn't there enough to share
 Or is that we just don't care?

-Words: Sami Yusuf
